job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI as a tool to enhance existing software development processes and productivity, rather than building, fine-tuning, or deploying core AI models. It lacks specific technical details about AI model development or MLOps, leaning more towards business application of AI.

phrases.phrase: elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.
phrases.justification: This phrase describes the high-level business objectives and market positioning that the AI implementation should support, indicating an understanding of business goals.

phrases.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
phrases.justification: This highlights the strategic business impact and desired outcomes of integrating AI, focusing on market leadership and customer satisfaction.

phrases.phrase: AI-First Software Engineer
phrases.justification: The title itself suggests a focus on software engineering where AI is a primary consideration.

phrases.phrase: elevating your coding skills to superhero status.
phrases.justification: This implies the use of AI to augment and improve traditional software development tasks.

phrases.phrase: Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.
phrases.justification: This describes the application of AI to enhance the software development lifecycle, including code generation and bug prediction.

phrases.phrase: implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
phrases.justification: This indicates the integration of AI into the core of software development projects and feature creation.

phrases.phrase: Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.
phrases.justification: This explicitly states the role of AI in enhancing existing software development workflows.

phrases.phrase: Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks.
phrases.justification: This reinforces the focus on core software development and creation activities.

phrases.phrase: tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot.
curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons.
Are you up for the challenge?
